channel.title: Max XP in Skill?
channel.description:
What is the Max XP in Skill code? Trying to make 200m capes, feel quite dumb for asking this tbh :palm: or the easiest way to do it?
Changing the itemRequiriments from 99 to 200m on my capes. [code] itemRequiriments.put(Skills.ATTACK, 99); [/code]
Thanks Mike

item.title: Max XP in Skill?
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

Nvm realised it did work, just disabled it from happening to Admins+. I am a idiot and I apologise :palm:

Read full topic

item.title: Max XP in Skill?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Again.
"server dependant"
Matrix might have a constant “MAX_EXPERIENCE” while a 317 Delta might not have any, and they just use the literal value of “200000000”.

Which would be why I told you to check your method where you add the XP to the skill.
It will literally have the information you’re asking me for…

I use this:

		if (c.playerXP[skill] > Config.MAX_SKILL_EXP) {
			c.playerXP[skill] = Config.MAX_SKILL_EXP;
			return 0;
		}

See how mine is “Config.MAX_SKILL_XP”? That would be my point.

Read full topic

item.title: Max XP in Skill?
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:549110”]Define “examples”?
Because every server is different… and I don’t know if you’re asking for an example on level reqs or on the capped exp…

Here’s how A PI handles some level reqs:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/323957-pi-item-level-requirements-pi.html[/quote]
My apologies, it should be the same as Matrix with MAX_EXPERIENCE or something like that?

Read full topic

item.title: Max XP in Skill?
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

I found out what it is, but because I have a slightly different item constraints thing that stops you using certain skills I can’t work out how to stop you using certain ID capes. Do you have any examples?

Read full topic

item.title: Max XP in Skill?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It’s server dependent.
Typically it’s set at 200m in a skill.

Search your addSkillXP or whatever method. It’ll tell ya.

Read full topic
